document_data.name: Texter
document_data.Description: Texter had a powerful build, ruddy face, and a thick brown mustache.
document_data.Personality: Texter had little love for the city and spent much of his time in the wilderness battling monsters. He disliked intrigue and politics, especially among the clerics in the [[Hall of Justice]].
document_data.Residence: When in the city, Texter dwelt in the Guard Barracks.
